column5: Well,  ran into a pull cord issue with the auger, going to be down for a couple of days  .........  BUT the good news is it gave us time to fine tune the weather making, snow making machine  Judging from the weather network for most of the country I think it's working   I'll lock my door now. LOL

Lol what is snow I keep reading the threads about it but I only shovelled a couple time this year well the drive way I did the side walk a few times and the snowblower worked 1 day I love the SW Ontario winters
